3. **Google Play Movies & TV**: You can rent or buy "The Father" on Google Play Movies & TV.
4. **Vudu**: You can rent or buy "The Father" on Vudu.
5. **YouTube Movies**: "The Father" is available to rent or buy on YouTube Movies.
6. **DVD/Blu-ray**: If you prefer a physical copy, you can purchase "The Father" on DVD or Blu-ray disc from online retailers like Amazon or in-store at a local video rental shop.

Make sure to check the availability in your region, as it might vary.
